name: A Chicken Dilemma
description:
A challenging puzzle game where you play a chicken who seems... pretty smart.

  •  Move on platforms
  • Platforms move each other (small blue lines indicate which ones)
  • Reach your eggs
  • Profit
MOVEArrows / WASD / ZSQD
RESTARTSPACE / R

There is 2 ways to play this game. Either test all paths, but you will need a good memory, or analyse ahead to find the solution using the indications. All levels were thoroughly tested and are feasible.

A game not made in 3h for trijam #179. All art, code, sounds and music were made for and during the jam.

Level design: NvN
Artist: Curly
Dev/Artist: Draelent
